articles.title: Best deals: free games at Epic Games Store and Ubisoft, refurb Xbox One - Polygon
articles.description: This weekend’s best gaming deals include Grand Theft Auto 5 free at the Epic Games Store and Assassin’s Creed Discovery Tour at Ubisoft. Plus a refurbished Xbox One bundle and a returning deal on Xbox Game Pass Ultimate.
articles.content: The Epic Games Store is bringing back its Epic Mega Sale with up to 70% off PC games on the digital platform, including bestselling titles like Control and Assassins Creed Odyssey. Epic is also throwing in a $10 coupon when you spend $14.99 or more during the… [+581 chars]

articles.title: Why Facebook just bought Giphy for $400m, explained in GIFs - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The social media giant says it wants to integrate Giphy's fun animations into Instagram. Its true ambitions may be far bigger
articles.content: A patent dispute drove many developers away to rival formats such as JPEG, and for many years the GIF was in the cold (although it enjoyed a persistent afterlife on the proto-YouTube meme site YTMND). In the late Noughties, however, animated GIFs began to soa… [+888 chars]

articles.content: Huawei Mate X/Xs and the Samsung Galaxy Fold are the two premium foldable devices on the market. They're incredibly pricey, however, with the Mate Xs carrying an MSRP of about US$2700even more expensive than the Foldmaking the devices unattainable to most con… [+1021 chars]

articles.description: So when are we getting a Black Mesa-esque remake of HL2 in Alyx' VR getup, then? Now that Valve have released Alyx' dev tools, anything's possible.
